pages.text: Mob farming has never been more compact and easy thanks to $(6)Tiny Mob Farms$(). Simply use the lasso to capture a mob, and place it inside a Tiny Mob Farm. Drops will auto-output to chests, so just place the mob farm touching a chest and off ya go! The higher the tier, the longer the lasso will last.
The wooden mob farm can only take passive mobs and gives drops every 50 seconds.
The stone mob farm can only take passive mobs and gives drops every 40 seconds.
The iron mob farm is the first level you also can place hostile mobs in and it gives drops every 30 seconds.
The golden mob farm will accept passive and hostile mobs and it gives drops every 20 seconds. You'll have to travel to the Nether to make this.
The diamond mob farm will accept passive and hostile mobs and it gives drops every 10 seconds. You won't be able to make this until you've been to the End.
The emerald mob farm will accept passive and hostile mobs and it gives drops every 5 seconds. It takes a rare drop to craft this farm.
The inferno mob farm will accept passive and hostile mobs and it gives drops every 2.5 seconds. You will have to visit many dimensions to craft this.
